  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_407</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_407</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Razones trigonométricas y relaciones entre ellas</string>
            <string language="en">Trigonometric ratios and the relations among them</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrische Verhältnisse und die Relationen
unter ihnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Taux trigonométriques et les relations parmi 
eux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relações trigonometric e as relações entre 
eles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporti trigonometrici ed i rapporti fra loro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trigonometric αναλογίες και οι σχέσεις μεταξύ τους</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las razones trigonométricas de un ángulo. Se estudian las razones trigonométricas y después las relaciones entre las diferentes razones trigonométricas de ángulos complementarios, suplementarios, que difieren 180 grados y opuestos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the trigonometric ratios of an angle and how these are related to the trigonometric ratios of complementary, supplementary and opposite angles, and angles which are 180 degrees away.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">suplementarios</string>
            <string language="en">supplementary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">razones trigonométricas</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric ratios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulos</string>
            <string language="en">angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">complementarios</string>
            <string language="en">complementary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die trigonometrischen Verhältnisse eines Winkels zu 
studieren und wie diese mit den trigonometrischen Verhältnissen der 
ergänzenden, Ergänzungs- und gegenüberliegenden Winkel 
zusammenhängen und Winkel, welche 180 Grad entfernt sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier les taux trigonométriques d'un angle et 
comment ceux-ci sont liés aux taux trigonométriques des angles 
complémentaires, supplémentaires et opposés, et angles ce qui sont 
à 180 degrés de partis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
as relações trigonometric de um ângulo e como estes são 
relacionados às relações trigonometric de ângulos complementares, 
suplementares e opostos, e ângulos quais têm 180 graus ausentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare i rapporti trigonometrici di un angolo e come questi sono 
collegati con i rapporti trigonometrici degli angoli complementari, 
supplementari ed opposti ed angoli quale sono assenti 180 gradi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιούν τις προσομοιώσεις
για να μελετήσουν τις trigonometric αναλογίες μιας γωνίας και 
πώς αυτοί συσχετίζονται με τις trigonometric αναλογίες των 
συμπληρωματικών, συμπληρωματικών και αντίθετων γωνιών, και γωνίες
που είναι 180 βαθμοί μακριά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ergänzungs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trigonometrische Verhältnisse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
